entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 6.
